about_the_game:
Face your fears, survive the chaos.

FoMO is a psychological horror game in first person, where your normal life turns into a nightmare filled with dark and terrifying scenarios. Featuring pixelated graphics and an immersive narrative, you’ll need to evade monsters and escape labyrinths while the world around you falls apart.

Story:

Your routine is always the same: wake up, go to work, come home, spend the evening at the bar – and repeat. But one single decision changes everything. Thought your boring life was about to get better? Well, it just got much, much worse.
Your apartment, neighborhood, and even the office where you work have transformed into dark, decaying, and bloody places. Shadows conceal dangers, and something terrible lurks around every corner.
Now, you must face your new reality. Familiar hallways and streets have become monster-filled labyrinths, and each day things get worse. Hide, escape, and confront your fears to uncover the truth – before it’s too late.

Features:

  • First-person gameplay: Immerse yourself in a first-person psychological horror experience.

  • Dark and engaging narrative: The story evolves, and your choices have consequences.

  • Retro pixelated graphics: Nostalgic visuals with a dark and chilling twist.

  • Randomized labyrinths: Navigate procedurally generated mazes filled with monsters.

  • Monsters and challenges: Stay alert to threats lurking in every corner. Run or hide!

  • Terrifying atmosphere: Every environment oozes tension, with haunting sounds and visuals that fuel your fear.

  • Missions: Don’t forget your routine! Complete tasks to advance the story.

  • Simple controls: Run and escape to survive. Every step is a risky choice.

What does FoMO mean?

It stands for “Fear of Missing Out,” the anxiety that you’re missing out on exciting events, movies, or social media trends – unless you’re connected 24/7.

name: FoMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Q8300 @2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 390 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound

short_description: FoMO is a psychological horror game in first person, where your normal life turns into a nightmare filled with dark and terrifying scenarios. Featuring pixelated graphics and an immersive narrative, you’ll need to evade monsters and escape labyrinths while the world around you falls apart.
